constituent: criticism, finger, fingers, compare, spoon, sitting on the ground, spoon2, sitting on the ground2
koohiiStory1: Think of the two most famous critics, Ebert and Roeper. On their show, they compare thumbs (which are technically fingers) with each other before dispensing criticism.
koohiiStory2: My criticism earned me the FINGER when I COMPARED her cooking to my mother´s.
myStory: chỉ trích. tay chỉ vào khi so sánh
words:
批判(ひはん): criticism, judgement, comment
批評(ひひょう): criticism, review, commentary
